action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A pizza with a thin crust and a lot of cheese on top. The pizza is on a silver plate. The pizza has a lot of red sauce and some green herbs on top. The crust is slightly burnt on the edges.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A pizza with white sauce, chicken, red peppers, and basil on a metal plate. There is a small piece of pizza on a white plate in the background.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A pizza with a thin crust and a lot of cheese on top. The pizza is on a silver plate. The pizza has a lot of red sauce and some green herbs on top. The crust is slightly burnt on the edges.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Does your pizza have any toppings other than cheese, red sauce, and green herbs?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A pizza with white sauce, chicken, red peppers, and basil on a metal plate. There is a small piece of pizza on a white plate in the background.
QUESTION: Does your pizza have any toppings other than cheese, red sauce, and green herbs? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the pizza in your image cut into slices?

ANSWER: No.
QUESTION: Is the pizza in your image cut into slices? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: Yes.
